title: Antonin Dvorak opera Tvrde palice (The Stubborn Lovers): a critical edition
abstractText: The research will entail the examination of manuscript and printed sources of Antonin Dvorak's third opera, Tvrde' palace (The stubborn Lovers), and the creations of a critical edition of the full score of the opera for scholars and performers (the only printed edition of the opera to date is a vocal score 1882). The edition will be published by the music publisher Editio-Barenreiter, Praque.
